headline: Citi Raises VeriSign (VRSN) Price Target After .com Domain Growth
summary: VeriSign, Inc. (NASDAQ:VRSN) ranks among the best forever stocks to invest in. On July 8, Citi reiterated its Buy rating on VeriSign, Inc. (NASDAQ:VRSN) while increasing the price target from $294 to $330 on the company’s shares. Citi noted encouraging domain patterns, stating that .com domains saw year-over-year growth in June for the first time […]
